content.question: When his team wins a basketball game, Joe says it is because his team is so good; however, when his team loses, he says it is because the referees made a lot of unfair calls. Joe is most clearly demonstrating

choices.label: self-serving bias, because he sees his team as being better than it is
self-serving bias, because he thinks all referees are unfair
conformity, because he sees his team as being better than it is
conformity, because his team follows all the rules of the game

content.answer: self-serving bias, because he sees his team as being better than it is

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
